channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- CompactLogix 5380 (5069-L3z)

item.title: CVE-2024-7515|2024-08-14T19:40:20.990Z -- rockwell%20automation -- compactlogix%205380%20%285069-l3z%29
item.description:
CVE-2024-7515 IMPACT
A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the affected products. A malformed PTP management packet can cause a major nonrecoverable fault in the controller.
